p: We ran each cSTSM under four climate scenarios (CSIRO, HadGEM, NorESM and no climate change) assuming no vegetation management and either no reduction in area burned or 50% wildfire reduction due to suppression efforts. No other forest management was included in any model. We ran each model for 90 time steps (2010â€“2100) and 100 simulation iterations. We used an existing ruleset [ 29] to classify a 2010 map of vegetation ( https://lemma.forestry.oregonstate.edu/data) to provide initial forest structure conditions for our model runs.
